rules.natural: Provided that the apple is grown in France, it is transported by truck.
Either the apple is grown in France or it is in good condition.
Whenever a quality check is performed on the apple, it follows that either the apple is sold locally or if it is not in good condition, then it is exported.
Either a quality check is performed on the apple, or it passes inspection.
Provided that the apple is certified organic, then if it passes inspection, it follows that either the apple is sold locally or if it is not in good condition, it is exported.
Either the apple is certified organic or it meets standards.
Under the condition that the apple meets standards, then if it passes inspection, it follows that either the apple is sold locally or if it is not in good condition, it is exported.
Whenever the apple is destroyed, it is rejected.
If mold is detected on the apple, then provided that it is not in good condition, it is destroyed.
Either mold is detected on the apple or it is pest-infested.
Whenever the apple is transported by truck, it is cooled.
If the apple is transported by truck, then it is not stored in a warehouse.
Either the apple is ripe or it is mature.
Under the condition that the apple is mature, it is in good condition.
Provided that the apple is discolored, it is damaged.
If a visual inspection is conducted on the apple, then if it is not the case that if the apple is bruised then it is discolored, it follows that the apple does not have a cosmetic issue.
Either a visual inspection is conducted on the apple or an automated check is performed.

Under the condition that an automated check is performed on the apple, then if it is not the case that if the apple is bruised then it is discolored, it follows that the apple does not have a cosmetic issue.
If the apple is edible, then it is not transported by truck.
Provided that the apple is washed, it is edible.
Whenever the apple is preserved, it is chemically treated.
Under the condition that the apple is treated, it is preserved.
Either the apple is hazardous, or if it is not the case that if the apple is processed in a factory then it is washed, it follows that the apple is treated.
If the apple is refrigerated, then it is stored in a warehouse.
Whenever the apple is cooled, it is temperature-controlled.
If the apple is temperature-controlled, then it is climate-regulated.
Whenever the apple is harvested at a farm, it is edible.
Either the apple is harvested at a farm or it is processed in a factory.
Under the condition that the apple is taste-tested, then if it is fresh, it follows that if it is climate-regulated, it is refrigerated.
Either the apple is taste-tested or it is consumer-approved.

If a final review is conducted on the apple, then if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the apple is processed in a factory then it is edible, it follows that it is not contaminated, and if it is packaged, then it is not market-ready.
Either a final review is conducted on the apple or a last check is performed.

Under the condition that a last check is performed on the apple, then if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the apple is processed in a factory then it is edible, it follows that it is not contaminated, and if it is packaged, then it is not market-ready.
Provided that the apple is peeled, it is edible.
If the apple is sliced, then it is peeled.
If the apple is cooked, then it is baked.
Provided that the apple is processed in a factory, it is cooked.
Whenever the apple is prepared, it is sliced.
Provided that the apple is heated, it is prepared.
Whenever the apple is oven-processed, then if it is baked, it is heated.
Either the apple is oven-processed or it is microwave-processed.
Under the condition that the apple is microwave-processed, then if it is baked, it is heated.
If the apple is rotten, then it is not grown in France.
Provided that the apple is spoiled, it is not grown in France.
Under the condition that the apple is safe to eat, it is consumable.
Either the apple is safe to eat or it is fit for consumption.

Either the apple is landfill-bound, or if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the apple is fit for consumption then if it is expired, it follows that either it is rotten or it is spoiled, it follows that disposal is required for the apple, then waste is managed for the apple.

If a packaging review is conducted on the apple, then if it is not the case that if the apple is processed in a factory then it is edible, it follows that it is not contaminated, and if it is packaged.
Either a packaging review is conducted on the apple or a container check is performed.
Either the apple is for the local market or it is for the export market.
Provided that the apple is for the export market, then if it is not in good condition, it is exported.
Whenever the apple is in large quantity, it is sold wholesale.
Provided that the apple is in consumer packaging, it is in retail packaging.
If the apple is distribution-approved, then either it is sold locally or if it is not in good condition, it is exported.
Under the condition that logistics are verified for the apple, then if it passes inspection, it is distribution-approved.
Whenever the apple is in quarantine, then if it is not in good condition, it is rejected.
Either the apple is in quarantine or it is in isolation.
Under the condition that the apple is in a contaminated batch, it is not restricted.
Whenever the apple is labeled, it is packaged.
Provided that the apple is tainted, it is not restricted.
Under the condition that the apple is banned, it is not prohibited.
Either a regulatory check is conducted on the apple or a compliance review is performed.
Provided that a compliance review is performed on the apple, then if it is banned, it is prohibited.
If it is not the case that either the apple is approved or if it is pest-infested, then provided that it is not in good condition, it is destroyed, then the apple is disputed.

Provided that it is not the case that if the apple is bruised then it is discolored, it has a cosmetic issue.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the apple is consumer-approved then if it is fresh, it follows that if it is climate-regulated, it is refrigerated, then the apple is recalled.

If it is not the case that either the apple is cleared, or it is in a contaminated batch, or it is tainted, then the apple is banned.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if a regulatory check is conducted on the apple then if it is banned, it is prohibited, then there is a legal issue with the apple.
Whenever it is not the case that if a regulatory check is conducted on the apple then if it is banned, it is prohibited, then there is not a legal issue with the apple.

Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that either the apple is approved or if it is pest-infested, then provided that it is not in good condition, it is destroyed, then the apple is not disputed, then arbitration is pending for the apple.

If it is not the case that if it is not the case that either the apple is approved or if it is pest-infested, then provided that it is not in good condition, it is destroyed, then the apple is not disputed, then arbitration is not pending for the apple.

If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the apple is processed in a factory then it is edible, it follows that it is not contaminated, and if it is packaged, then the apple is market-ready.
Under the condition that the apple is not in good condition, it is not rejected.
